sentences.english: I can resist everything except temptation" is a very interesting epigram ."
sentences.chinese: “除了誘惑我什麼都能夠抵制”是句非常有趣的雋語。

sentences.english: More haste, less speed' is a well-known paradox.
sentences.chinese: 欲速不達＇是人所熟知的雋語。

sentences.english: A concise, clever, often paradoxical statement.
sentences.chinese: 雋語一個簡明，機智，經常似是而非的陳述。

sentences.english: Mr Jeremy Fisher even had some Quotable Quotes which he had written down along the way.
sentences.chinese: 傑里米教師以至寫上了一些他一路所記的名言雋語。

sentences.english: The audience was amused by his speech full of epigrams.
sentences.chinese: “除了誘惑我什麼都能夠抵制”是句非常有趣的雋語。

sentences.english: It is sad that I can remember nothing of all this scintillation .
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，這些妙言雋語我現在都回憶不起來了。

sentences.english: So will today's teenage girls use their moms ' idioms proudly?
sentences.chinese: 那麼今天的少女會自豪地應用母親的雋語嗎？

sentences.english: " I can resist everything except temptation " is a very interesting epigram .
sentences.chinese: “除了誘惑我什麼都能夠抵制”是句非常有趣的雋語。

sentences.english: What salt is to the food, wit and humour are to conversation and literature.
sentences.chinese: 雋語與幽默之於會話與文學，恰象鹽之於食物一樣。

sentences.english: Paradox and irony are characteristics of her style.
sentences.chinese: 她善於使用似非而是的雋語和反語。

sentences.english: 'More haste, less speed' is a paradox.
sentences.chinese: “欲速則不達”是似非而是的雋語。
